item.title: VideoAutoArena: An Automated Arena for Evaluating Large Multimodal Models in Video Analysis through User Simulation
item.description: VideoAutoArena automates large multimodal model (LMM) evaluation using simulated users, offering a cost-effective and scalable solution compared to traditional human annotation.
